# Synology for Transport Canada

## Tender Reference Number
SSC-22-00021016:T

## Amendment Number
1

## Solicitation Reference Number
BPM017566/21016

## Tender Notice Date
December 15, 2022

## Tender Closing Date
January 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

## Tender Status
Expired

---

**Synopsis of the Tender:**

This tender notice concerns the purchase of a High Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications by Shared Services Canada for Transport Canada.

**Key Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Contracting Entity:**

* **Name:** Shared Services Canada
* **Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Clara Whittaker
* **Email:** clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 343-553-8354
* **Fax:** 343-553-8354

**Access to Solicitation:**

To register and view the solicitation, please visit the Shared Services Canada P2P portal: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login
 registration instructions are available at this link.

**Security Requirements:**

Note that this tender requires bidders to complete the registering process. Attachments to the solicitation are available online at the following links:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E2564D03-ACAE-4987-A82C-FE2E7FEB86DE,
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E4298020-F04D-49AB-9547-6311D36289DA.
